name: Dream Chronicles: The Book of Air
name_original: Dream Chronicles: The Book of Air
description:
Dream Chronicles: The Book of Air is a puzzle game developed by KatGames. It came out on 24-06-2010. It was published by PlayFirst.
Dream Chronicles: The Book of Air is available on PC.
It was produced by Craig Bocks and Ryan Sindledecker. Aaron Norstad directed the game. It was scored by Adam Gubman.
